Class MenuWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • MenuWorld
  • public class MenuWorld
extends greenfoot.World
    The menu screen. The user may adjust simulation settings here, before hitting the "Start" button, to begin the simulation.
    Version:
    2022.11.22
    Author:
    Caden Chan

      MenuWorld​(greenfoot.GreenfootSound[] tracks)
      Constructor for the MenuWorld, where the user makes selections on their simulation settings.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the simulation. Pass in the user's selected settings into CookieWorld. Stop the menu background music

      • addPreviewGrandma

        public void addPreviewGrandma​(int player)
        Display a PreviewGrandma object to the Menu. Position is based on p1_previewGrandmaPos and p2_previewGrandmaPos
        Parameters:
        player - The ID of the player whose starting grandma count is increased

      • removePreviewGrandma

        public void removePreviewGrandma​(int player)
        Remove a PreviewGrandma object from the Menu
        Parameters:
        player - The ID of the player whose starting grandma count is decreased

      • addPreviewClicker

        public void addPreviewClicker​(int player)
        Display a PreviewClicker object with the appropriate speed to the Menu.
        Parameters:
        player - The ID of the player whose clicker count is increased

      • removePreviewClicker

        public void removePreviewClicker​(int player)
        Remove a PreviewClicker object from the Menu.
        Parameters:
        player - The ID of the player whose clicker count is decreased

      • editSpeed

        public void editSpeed​(int player,
                      int newSpeed)
        Change the speed of the PreviewClickers belonging to the given player
        Parameters:
        player - The ID of the player whose CPS is altered
        newSpeed - The player's clickers' new CPS
